$AAPL  $TSLA   🍏  *Elon Musk, about to Sell 10% of his TSLA Shares, to raise Money to Pay U.S. Fed. Taxes, on his Gains?  Elon says, he doesn’t take a Salary…”only has his shares”…must raise cash.  Letting Twitter decide through voting…so far, Twitter says “Sell”.  In the very Short Term…if he exits 10% by year end, Analysts say Shares could be under price pressure into year end.  Sell TSLA, Buy AAPL…year end, is fast approaching.

$F "How Ford Won the Race for Rivian
The auto giant could reap more than $7 billion from a hot IPO. To get there, it had to elbow out rival General Motors."
https://www.wsj.com/articles/how-ford-won-the-race-for-rivian-11636171218
"When hot electric-truck startup Rivian Automotive Inc. goes public next week seeking a valuation of roughly $70 billion, one of the biggest winners is likely to be a 118-year-old Detroit giant. Ford Motor Co. could make a windfall of more than $7 billion from the deal, as an investor with a 12% stake.

But it wasn’t supposed to happen this way. More than two years ago, Ford’s biggest rival, General Motors Co., was poised to make the critical investment in Rivian." ( but they didn't, and went with embarrassing Nikola instead )

Also bullish on : $SPY $LLKKF $LIT $AAPL
